descriptions.ja: オブジェクトを固有に識別する番号
descriptions.en: A number that allows each object to be uniquely identified.

note.ja: 1バイト目は0xFE。2～4バイト目はメーカコード。残りは機器毎のユニーク値
note.en: 1st data is 0xFE. 2nd to 4th data is manufacture code. The rest should be unique to each device.

descriptions.en: Identifies the product using ASCII code.

descriptions.ja: 空の蓄電池より充電可能な電力量 (AC)
descriptions.en: This property indicates the electric energy that can be charged from an empty storage battery (AC).

descriptions.ja: 満充電の蓄電池より放電可能な電力量 (AC)
descriptions.en: This property indicates the electric energy that can be discharged from a fully-charged storage battery (AC).

descriptions.ja: 通常時において、充電可能な電力量 (AC)
descriptions.en: This property indicates the electric energy that can be charged during a normal time (AC).

descriptions.ja: 通常時において、放電可能な電力量 (AC)
descriptions.en: This property indicates the electric energy that can be discharged during a normal time (AC).

descriptions.ja: 現時点での充電可能な電力量 (AC)
descriptions.en: This property indicates the electric energy that can be charged at the present point in time (AC).

descriptions.ja: 現時点での放電可能な電力量 (AC)
descriptions.en: This property indicates the electric energy that can be discharged at the present point in time (AC).

descriptions.ja: 充電可能容量に対して、充電の上限値を％で設定する (AC)
descriptions.en: This property sets the upper limit value for charging in relation to chargeable capacity in % (AC).

descriptions.ja: 放電可能容量に対して、放電の下限値を％で設定する (AC)
descriptions.en: This property sets the lower limit value for discharging in relation to dischargeable capacity in % (AC).

propertyName.ja: AC積算充電電力量計測値
propertyName.en: AC measured cumulative charging electric energy

descriptions.ja: 積算充電電力量 (AC)を0.001kWhで示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the cumulative charging electric energy (AC) in 0.001kW.

propertyName.ja: AC積算放電電力量計測値
propertyName.en: AC measured cumulative discharging electric energy

descriptions.ja: 積算放電電力量 (AC)を0.001kWhで示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the cumulative discharging electric energy (AC) in 0.001kWh.

descriptions.ja: 充電の電力量 (AC)をWhで指定する
descriptions.en: This property indicates the electric energy for charging (AC) in Wh.

descriptions.ja: 放電の電力量 (AC)をWhで指定する
descriptions.en: This property indicates the electric energy for discharging (AC) in Wh.

descriptions.ja: 運転モード設定 (EPC=0xDA)に充電 (0x42)を設定した時の充電方式を示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates charging method when setting charging (0x42) to operation mode setting (EPC = 0xDA).

descriptions.ja: 運転モード設定 (EPC=0xDA)に放電 (0x43)を設定した時の放電方式を示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates discharging method when setting discharging (0x43) to operation mode setting (EPC = 0xDA).

descriptions.ja: 蓄電池の定格電力量をWh (AC)で示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the rated electric energy of the storage battery in Wh (AC).

descriptions.ja: 蓄電池への充電電力の最小値および最大値を、それぞれW (AC)で示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the minimum/maximum electric power for charging in watts (AC).

descriptions.ja: 蓄電池への充電電力の最小値および最大値を、それぞれW (AC)で示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the minimum/maximum electric power for charging in watts (AC).

descriptions.ja: 蓄電池からの放電電力の最小値および最大値を、それぞれW (AC)で示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the minimum/maximum electric power for discharging in watts (AC).

descriptions.ja: 蓄電池からの放電電力の最小値および最大値を、それぞれW (AC)で示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the minimum/maximum electric power for discharging in watts (AC).

descriptions.ja: 蓄電池への充電電流の最小値および最大値を、それぞれ0.1A (AC)で示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the minimum/maximum current for charging in units of 0.1A (AC).

descriptions.ja: 蓄電池からの放電電流の最小値および最大値を、それぞれ0.1A (AC)で示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the minimum/maximum current for discharging in units of 0.1A (AC).

descriptions.ja: 系統への連系の許可、禁止を設定する
descriptions.en: This property sets permission and prohibition for interconnection to system.

descriptions.ja: 蓄電池運転の許可、禁止を設定する
descriptions.en: This property sets permission and prohibition for storage battery operation.

descriptions.ja: 蓄電池の自立運転の許可、禁止を設定する
descriptions.en: This property sets permission and prohibition for independent operation of the storage battery.

descriptions.ja: 蓄電池の動作状態を示す。充電状態、放電状態、待機状態の各運転動作状態は必須とする
descriptions.en: This property indicates the working operation status. The operation action statuses of charging status, discharging status and standby status are required.

descriptions.ja: 蓄電池の動作状態を示す。充電状態、放電状態、待機状態の各運転動作状態は必須とする
descriptions.en: This property indicates the working operation status. The operation action statuses of charging status, discharging status and standby status are required.

descriptions.ja: 蓄電池の定格電力量をWh (DC)で示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the rated electric energy of the battery in Wh (DC).

descriptions.ja: 蓄電池の定格充電容量を0.1Ah (DC)で示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the rated charging capacity of the battery in units of 0.1Ah (DC).

descriptions.ja: 蓄電池の定格電圧をV (DC)で示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the rated voltage of the battery in volts (DC).

propertyName.ja: 瞬時充放電電力計測値

descriptions.ja: 瞬時充放電電力を±W (AC)で示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the measured instantaneous charging/discharging electric power in watts (AC) (positive/negative).

propertyName.ja: 瞬時充放電電流計測値

descriptions.ja: 瞬時充放電電流を±0.1A (AC)で示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the measured instantaneous charging/discharging current in units of 0.1A (AC) (positive/negative).

propertyName.ja: 瞬時充放電電圧計測値

descriptions.ja: 瞬時充放電電圧を±V (AC)で示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the measured instantaneous charging/discharging voltage in volts (AC) (positive/negative).

propertyName.ja: 積算放電電力量計測値

descriptions.ja: 積算放電電力量を0.001kWhで示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the measured cumulative discharging electric energy in units of 0.001kWh.

propertyName.ja: 積算放電電力量リセット設定
propertyName.en: Measured cumulative discharging electric energy reset setting

descriptions.ja: 積算放電電力量をリセットする
descriptions.en: Resets 'Measured cumulative discharging electric energy' to zero.

note.en: Access rule of the corresponding ECHONET Lite property is Set only.

propertyName.ja: 積算充電電力量計測値

descriptions.ja: 積算充電電力量を0.001kWhで示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the measured cumulative charging electric energy in units of 0.001kWh.

propertyName.ja: 積算充電電力量リセット設定
propertyName.en: Measured cumulative charging electric energy reset setting

descriptions.ja: 積算充電電力量をリセットする
descriptions.en: Resets 'Measured cumulative charging electric energy' to zero.

note.en: Access rule of the corresponding ECHONET Lite property is Set only.

descriptions.ja: 急速充電/充電/放電/待機/テスト/自動/その他の運転モードを設定する。充電、放電、待機の各運転モードを必須とする
descriptions.en: Sets the battery to one of the following operation modes: 'Rapid charging,' 'Charging,' 'Discharging,' 'Standby,' 'Test,' 'Auto' or 'Others.' The operation modes of charging, discharging and standby are required.

descriptions.ja: 急速充電/充電/放電/待機/テスト/自動/その他の運転モードを設定する。充電、放電、待機の各運転モードを必須とする
descriptions.en: Sets the battery to one of the following operation modes: 'Rapid charging,' 'Charging,' 'Discharging,' 'Standby,' 'Test,' 'Auto' or 'Others.' The operation modes of charging, discharging and standby are required.

descriptions.ja: 急速充電/充電/放電/待機/テスト/自動/その他の運転モードを設定する。充電、放電、待機の各運転モードを必須とする
descriptions.en: Sets the battery to one of the following operation modes: 'Rapid charging,' 'Charging,' 'Discharging,' 'Standby,' 'Test,' 'Auto' or 'Others.' The operation modes of charging, discharging and standby are required.

descriptions.ja: 急速充電/充電/放電/待機/テスト/自動/その他の運転モードを設定する。充電、放電、待機の各運転モードを必須とする
descriptions.en: Sets the battery to one of the following operation modes: 'Rapid charging,' 'Charging,' 'Discharging,' 'Standby,' 'Test,' 'Auto' or 'Others.' The operation modes of charging, discharging and standby are required.

note.ja: このプロパティをGetして取得できる値は設定値である。実際の運転状態はactualOperationModeをGETすること
note.en: The value you get with this property is the value you set. Get actualOperationMode for the current status.

descriptions.ja: 系統連系状態のタイプを示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the status of connection with the current system (system interconnection status).
System-interconnected type (reverse power flow not acceptable)

descriptions.ja: 系統連系状態のタイプを示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the status of connection with the current system (system interconnection status).
System-interconnected type (reverse power flow not acceptable)

propertyName.ja: 最小最大充電電力値 (独立時)

descriptions.ja: 独立時の蓄電池への充電電力の最小値および最大値を、それぞれW (AC)で示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the minimum and maximum values of charging power battery in watts (AC) in the dependent status.

propertyName.ja: 最小最大放電電力値 (独立時)

descriptions.ja: 独立時の蓄電池からの放電電力の最小値および最大値を、それぞれW (AC)で示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the minimum and maximum values of discharging power from the battery in the independent status in watts (AC).

propertyName.ja: 最小最大充電電流値 (独立時)

descriptions.ja: 独立時の蓄電池への充電電流の最小値および最大値を、それぞれ0.1A (AC)で示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the minimum and maximum values of a charging current to the battery in the independent status in units of 0.1A (AC).

propertyName.ja: 最小最大放電電流値 (独立時)

descriptions.ja: 独立時の蓄電池からの放電電流の最小値および最大値を、それぞれ0.1A (AC)で示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the minimum and maximum values of a discharging current in the independent status in units of 0.1A (AC).

descriptions.ja: 充電/放電の電力量を Wh (DC) で指定する。プラス値は充電、マイナス値は放電。
descriptions.en: Specify the charging (positive value) or discharging (negative value) electric energy in Wh (DC).

remark.ja: EPC=0xE0を実装する場合は、EPC=0xE1,E7,E8,E9,EAを実装しない。プラス値：充電 マイナス値：放電
remark.en: In case EPC=0xE0 is implemented, EPC=0xE1,E7,E8,E9,EA should not be implemented. Positive value: Charging, Negative value: Discharging.

note.ja: 充電時 (プラス値)／放電時 (マイナス値)
note.en: During charging (positive value) / During discharging (negative value)

descriptions.ja: 充電/放電の電力量を Wh (DC) で指定する。プラス値は充電、マイナス値は放電。
descriptions.en: Specify the charging (positive value) or discharging (negative value) electric energy in Wh (DC).

remark.ja: EPC=0xE0を実装する場合は、EPC=0xE1,E7,E8,E9,EAを実装しない。プラス値：充電 マイナス値：放電
remark.en: In case EPC=0xE0 is implemented, EPC=0xE1,E7,E8,E9,EA should not be implemented. Positive value: Charging, Negative value: Discharging.

note.ja: 充電時 (プラス値)／放電時 (マイナス値)
note.en: During charging (positive value) / During discharging (negative value)

descriptions.ja: 充電/放電の電力量を Ah (DC) で指定する。プラス値は充電、マイナス値は放電。
descriptions.en: Specify the charging (positive value) or discharging (negative value) electric energy in Ah (DC).

remark.ja: EPC=0xE1を実装する場合は、EPC=0xE0,E7,E8,E9,EAを実装しない。プラス値：充電 マイナス値：放電
remark.en: In case EPC=0xE1 is implemented, EPC=0xE0,E7,E8,E9,EA should not be implemented. Positive value: Charging, Negative value: Discharging.

note.ja: 充電時 (プラス値)／放電時 (マイナス値)
note.en: During charging (positive value) / During discharging (negative value)

descriptions.ja: 充電/放電の電力量を Ah (DC) で指定する。プラス値は充電、マイナス値は放電。
descriptions.en: Specify the charging (positive value) or discharging (negative value) electric energy in Ah (DC).

remark.ja: EPC=0xE1を実装する場合は、EPC=0xE0,E7,E8,E9,EAを実装しない。プラス値：充電 マイナス値：放電
remark.en: In case EPC=0xE1 is implemented, EPC=0xE0,E7,E8,E9,EA should not be implemented. Positive value: Charging, Negative value: Discharging.

note.ja: 充電時 (プラス値)／放電時 (マイナス値)
note.en: During charging (positive value) / During discharging (negative value)

descriptions.en: This property indicates the remaining stored electric energy in Wh (DC).
This property indicates the remaining capacity in units of 0.1Ah (DC).
This property indicates the charging rate of the battery in %.

descriptions.ja: 蓄電池の劣化状態 (健康状態)を%で示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the battery state of health in %.
This property indicates the battery type.

descriptions.ja: 充電の電力量をWh (DC)で指定する
descriptions.en: This property specifies the charging electric energy in Wh (DC).

remark.ja: EPC=0xE7を実装する場合は、EPC=0xE0,E1,E9を実装しない
remark.en: In case EPC=0xE7 is implemented, EPC=0xE0,E1,E9 should not be implemented.

descriptions.ja: 放電の電力量をWh (DC)で指定する
descriptions.en: This property specifies the discharging electric energy in Wh (DC).

remark.ja: EPC=0xE8を実装する場合は、EPC=0xE0,E1,EAを実装しない
remark.en: In case EPC=0xE8 is implemented, EPC=0xE0,E1,EA should not be implemented.

descriptions.ja: 充電の容量を0.1Ah (DC)で指定する
descriptions.en: This property specifies the charging capacity in units of 0.1Ah (DC).

remark.ja: EPC=0xE9を実装する場合は、EPC=0xE0,E1,E7を実装しない
remark.en: In case EPC=0xE9 is implemented, EPC=0xE0,E1,E7 should not be implemented.

descriptions.ja: 放電の容量を0.1Ah (DC)で指定する
descriptions.en: This property specifies the discharging capacity in units of 0.1Ah (DC).

remark.ja: EPC=0xEAを実装する場合は、EPC=0xE0,E1,E8を実装しない
remark.en: In case EPC=0xEA is implemented, EPC=0xE0,E1,E8 should not be implemented.

descriptions.ja: 充電の電力をW (AC)で指定する
descriptions.en: This property specifies the charging electric power in watts (AC).

descriptions.ja: 放電の電力をW (AC)で指定する
descriptions.en: This property specifies the discharging electric power in watts (AC).

descriptions.ja: 充電の電流を0.1A (AC)で指定する
descriptions.en: This property specifies the charging current in units of 0.1A (AC).

descriptions.ja: 放電の電流を0.1A (AC)で指定する
descriptions.en: This property specifies the discharging current in units of 0.1A (AC).

descriptions.ja: 独立時の蓄電池の定格電圧をV (AC)で示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the rated voltage of a battery in the independent status in volts (AC).
